As Remi, the rat from the film Ratatouille

425.text:
So, next time you plug in your iPod, hum a
song, or pull out your guitar, ask yourself

432.text:
this, why am I doing this? Is it in order
to survive, or is it the reason why I survive?

440.text: Is this what makes my life worth living?
